title: Farewell, Nibel - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.31.22
description:
Nibel leaves Twitter, EA strikes a deal with Marvel and more big news on this Halloween episode of Kinda Funny Games Daily with Blessing and Tim.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:20 - Housekeeping

Who ya gonna call to talk GhostbustersVR? Us! Today, our Halloween stream kicks off with a Ghostbusters VR world premiere! Greg's played it, he's talking to the team who made it, and they're debuting the name and key art! Don't miss it!

The first of four Kinda Funny Special Presentation videos from Barrett is coming out this Wednesday! Join him for a YouTube Premiere at 9am PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames as he tries to answer the question: Has Kratos truly changed over the course of the last 17 years?

The Roper Report  -

00:04:19 - Prolific game news account Nibel has quit Twitter
00:12:16 - Electronic Arts Strikes Three-Game Deal With Marvel
00:26:49 - Ad
00:29:42 - God Of War Ragnarök Leaks Early, beware of spoilers
00:33:22 - Phil Spencer acknowledges ‘it’s been too long’ since Xbox’s last big first-party game
00:43:50 - Ex-Destiny 2 producer Jared Neuss becomes new Overwatch 2 Executive Producer
00:46:29 - Riven, the sequel to Myst, is getting a modern remake
00:50:36 - Out today
00:51:04 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
